subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Mike Rice, who led Robert Morris to two appearances in the N.C.A.A. tournament, was introduced as the coach of Rutgers on Thursday.
snippet: Mike Rice, who led Robert Morris to two appearances in the N.C.A.A. tournament, was introduced as the coach of Rutgers on Thursday.
